long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Superpower ClaudeAI  Easy to use

Read Aloud A Text to Speech Voice Reader
 for Claude.ai (Claude AI).
Read aloud the current chat using text to speech (TTS). 

This extension adds powerful features to make your AI conversations more productive, accessible, and tailored to your needs.

Key features:
- NO API keys and complicated stuff needed, just install the it and enable TTS / voice reader from the settings. 
- Text-to-speech: Have Claude's responses read aloud to you, perfect for multitasking or accessibility
- Community-driven enhancements: Benefit from new features requested by users like you
- Direct feedback channel: Easily suggest improvements or report issues
- Customizable AI interactions (coming soon):
